title: gmhleasr: Shiny Dashboard and API Client for GMH Communities Leasing Data — gmhleasr-package
text: Provides Shiny dashboard API client interacting GMH Communities leasing data via Entrata API. Includes functions API authentication, data retrieval, data visualization.
